snippet.title: Computer War for the Atari 8-bit family
snippet.description:
Came also out for:

???


Game description:

Computer War is a strategy\action game based on the movie "WarGames".

There are several missiles flying across the map, which you have to track down and to destroy (that being the action part of the game).


What I think:

For a game that is so repetitive, it is surprisingly not bad. Of course, it is not good either.
